onClick.label: function() { return 'View automated summary for gene '+this.feature.get('name'); }

onClick.url: function() { var fbab=this.feature.get('break_of'); if( fbab ) { if( Array.isArray(fbab) ) { return 'javascript:void(0)'; } } else { return 'javascript:void(0)'; } return '/reports/'+fbab; }
